metadata.Title: CVE-2023-36183 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in OpenImageIO v.2.4.12.0 and before allows a remote to execute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via a crafted file to the readimg function.

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
